page.description: These are the sub-properties that determine what an expanded 'Flow Collapse Button' looks like, if it uses an icon, and if it has bubble help.

section.title: Button HTML
section.description: Optional. Specify the text to show on the button when the Panels before this Panel are colllapsed(i.e. docked or hidden). If you don't specify a value a default the >> symbol will be used.

section.title: Button icon
section.description: The Icon to show for expanding a Panel.

section.title: Button pressed icon
section.description: The Icon to show when the 'flow collapse' button is pressed to expand it.

section.title: Button bubble help
section.description: Bubble help text to add to the button so that users can see what the button does if they hover over it.
